intro: Psychotria koumounaboualiensis, commonly known as the Koumouna Bouali Psychotria, is a species of flowering plant in the Rubiaceae family. It is native to the tropical rainforests of western Africa, particularly in countries like Ghana and Togo. The plant is characterized by its small, elliptical leaves and clusters of small, white to pale yellow flowers. It produces small, berry-like fruits that are typically red when mature. This species is of interest to botanists due to its unique morphology and potential ethnobotanical uses.
